entry.title: My First Blog Post
entry.summary: This is my first blog post using Pelican
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog! This is my first post using Pelican, a static site generator written in Python.

Why Pelican?

Pelican is a great choice for a static blog because:

  1. It's written in Python
  2. It's fast and lightweight
  3. It supports Markdown
  4. It's highly customizable

What's Next?

In future posts, I'll be writing about:

  • Technology
  • Programming
  • Personal projects
  • And more!
